column2: "That's what the ARKS Code says on the matter. In layman's terms, here's what it's really saying."
"Anyone who can't even handle Phongalphs has no business getting a Mag."
"Mags are incredibly useful for ARKS operatives, and while everyone love to have one, they can be dangerous in the wrong hands."
"That's why you need a license, and  can't have a Mag without one.."
"Though some may say there really is no need for a Mag, I definitely recommend that you get this license."

"This tutorial is an explanation on 'Mags.'  Mags are mechanical lifeforms that support your character. Mags are like a partner that grows with your character.  They can provide support in a variety of areas, such as parameter revisions, combat support, photon blasts, production, etc."
"Mags can mature into a variety of types, and they can raise the status of a character by converting the character abilities to the stats of the equipped Mag."

"Mags grow by eating items. Their abilities that increase will change depending on the items they're given. When they reach a certain level, they will evolve into new forms.  *Items can only be given to Mags when they are low on energy."
"Among the newly evolved Mags, there are a variety of types and effects, such as those that will automatically attack a hostile, or heal a player."
"Use the Mag device to customize the abilities and appearance of your Mags.  Get a Mag license to raise a Mag that can be your adventuring partner!"
